text: Day 782: Russia-Ukraine War Updates 🇺🇦️✊️1. Intensified shelling in Donetsk continues to threaten civilian lives.2. Diplomatic efforts stalled as international community condemns Russia's actions.3. Refugee crisis persists with over 3M seeking safety abroad.4. Humanitarian aid deliveries disrupted by ongoing conflict.5. Calls for ceasefire and peace talks grow louder.We stand in solidarity with Ukraine & its people! #StandWithUkraine 💛💙
